title: We’ve Lost Touch With Reality and What Matters, but We Can Work to Reverse It
description: "Former high school teachers become famous writing as experts on COVID-19. Law professors become COVID-policy provocateurs. We love it, hungry for more," writes Shawn Whatley.  (The Canadian Press/Paul Chiasson)
